mapper.select: select * from brand order by brand_enrolldate desc
mapper.update: update product set product_state = #{productState} where product_no = #{productNo}
update brand set brand_state = #{brandState} where brand_no = #{brandNo}
mapper.select: select big_category.bc_title as "pre_product_bctitle", small_category.sc_title as "pre_product_sctitle", brand.brand_title as "pre_product_brandtitle", pre_product_title as "pre_product_title", pre_product_state as "pre_product_state", pre_product_date as "pre_product_date", pre_product_no as "pre_product_no" from pre_product join brand on (brand.brand_no = pre_product.brand_no) join big_category on (pre_product.bc_no = big_category.bc_no) join small_category on (pre_product.sc_no = small_category.sc_no) order by pre_product_date desc
select count(*) from pre_product order by pre_product_date desc

select big_category.bc_title as "product_bc_title", small_category.sc_title as "product_sc_title", product.product_title as "product_product_title", brand.brand_title as "product_brand_title", product.product_enrolldate as "product_enrolldate", product.product_enddate as "product_enddate" , product.product_no as "product_no" from product join big_category on (big_category.bc_no = product.bc_no) join brand on (brand.brand_no = product.brand_no) join small_category on (small_category.sc_no = product.sc_no) order by product_update desc
select member_id, member_name, member_email, member_phone, member_enrolldate from member where member_no != 'M_NO_1' order by member_no asc
select count(*) from SELLER_REQUEST where SELLER_REQ_TYPE = #{reqRef}

select SELLER_REQUEST.SELLER_REQ_NO as "seller_req_no", SELLER_REQUEST.MEMBER_NO as "member_no", SELLER_REQUEST.SELLER_REQ_REF as "seller_req_ref", SELLER_REQUEST.SELLER_REQ_TYPE as "seller_req_type", SELLER_REQUEST.SELLER_REQ_STATE as "seller_req_state", SELLER_REQUEST.SELLER_REQ_TITLE as "seller_req_title", SELLER_REQUEST.SELLER_REQ_CONTENT as "seller_req_content", SELLER_REQUEST.SELLER_REQ_DATE as "seller_req_date", SELLER_REQUEST.SELLER_REQ_PROCESS as "seller_req_process", MEMBER.MEMBER_ID as "member_id" from SELLER_REQUEST join member on (member.member_no = SELLER_REQUEST.member_no) where SELLER_REQ_TYPE = #{reqRefType} order by SELLER_REQ_DATE
select BRAND_TITLE from brand where BRAND_NO = #{reqRef}
select PRODUCT_TITLE from PRODUCT where PRODUCT_NO = #{reqRef}
mapper.update: update SELLER_REQUEST set SELLER_REQ_PROCESS = #{sellerReqProcess} where SELLER_REQ_NO = #{sellerReqNo}
update SELLER_REQUEST set SELLER_REQ_STATE = #{sellerReqState} where SELLER_REQ_NO = #{sellerReqNo}
